channel.title: Help please :)
channel.description:
Hey guy's, im not new to servers but..am to 508 servers, im a good coder in normal server's i suppose, but i just don't get 508, can someone tell me the main file where i can edit.. i just wana change like when you login it has "never tell you're password to anyone" i just want to change that, and the login screan..just yeah i wont to edit the hole thing, when you login you start at varrock, and you hit dummys ect, you lvl, how can i change starting pos, exp rates.. and just totally pimp the source :) maybe a tutorial?? i've been searching for awhile i just can't seem to find any tutorial that suits me =\
~impulse arrow
Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2008, 05:29:28 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post, but ill rep ++

item.title: Help please :)
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

508’s use many handlers to increase performance and also increase orginization.

I never really worked on a 508, but there is one file that is kind of like the client.java in regular sources…
But it doesn’t contain much, only the cases for packets, it then connects it to a file, usually lets say in the “main file”, it’ll perhaps link it to the folder that says Commands. You then make a main file that distributes codes to other files so it would work.

So each command is handled… and its not like a 317 where it lags more when there is more files, its built better, WAY better.

For what your saying, “never tell you’re password to anyone”, its probably in your server files, just got to find it.

And for dummies, you would go to the object click handler, which is probably in the world folder.
For creating new things which aren’t out yet, such as Dueling on a 508, you would be best to create handlers for it, and link things needed, like first click - the attack boolean etc, to that file.

Once again, I’m not very good at coding 508’s, but this is most likely what it would be.

Read full topic
